title: NLCIL produces 1,234 crore units of clean power as it treads green path
description: State-owned NLC India Ltd (NLCIL) has produced 1,234 crore units of green power, preventing the emission of one crore tonne of carbon dioxide. NLCIL aims to achieve 10,000 MW renewable energy capacity by 2030 and has formed subsidiaries for asset monetisation and clean energy initiatives. Significant projects are underway in Tamil Nadu, Rajasthan, Gujarat, and Assam.
